thread.title: Shark attack at Cardwell leaves man with serious leg injuries - ABC Online
thread.title_full: Shark attack at Cardwell leaves man with serious leg injuries - ABC Online

title: Shark attack at Cardwell leaves man with serious leg injuries - ABC Online
text:
Shark attack at Cardwell leaves man with critical injuries Updated February 18, 2017 13:00:38 Map: Cardwell 4849 
A teenager has serious leg injuries following a shark attack at Cardwell in far north Queensland, paramedics say. 
A spokeswoman for the Queensland Ambulance Service said the man, believed to be 19 years old, was in a critical condition with severe blood loss with multiple bites to his upper and lower leg. 
He was attacked off Point Hinchinbrook boat ramp about 10:30am. 
He is being treated by paramedics on a jetty after being brought to shore by a boat. 
A rescue helicopter is on its way to the location from Cairns. 
Paramedics believe the teen was bitten by either a bull shark or a tiger shark. 
More to come.
